title: President witnesses flag hoisting ceremony at Naudero House
content:
NAUDERO, Apr 14 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari Sunday witnessed the national flag hoisting ceremony at Naudero House here.
On the occasion, a smartly turned out contingent of Sindh Police presented guard of honour to the President. He prayed for the progress and prosperity of the country.
Chairman Pakistan Peoples Party Bilawal Bhutto Zardari, Faryal Talpur and officials of Sindh government were also present.
